author: andschwa
body:
In order to facilitate moving to One Codebase ™, the .NET Core packages need to be downgraded from build rc2-24123 (the last RC2 release from .NET Core) to the exact build that Nano has, rc2-24027.

This posed a problem with MMI and MMIN, as these packages needed to be rebuilt with the downgraded versions.
title: Downgrade .NET Core packages to Nano's build rc2-24027
